newsitem.title: USA: MBIA qualifies muni 11 bond issues for insurance.
newsitem.headline: MBIA qualifies muni 11 bond issues for insurance.

text.p: MBIA Insurance Corp said Thursday it qualified for bond insurance the following 11 municipal bond issues scheduled for competitive sale today:
--Pottsville School District No 61, Ark., $2.085 million contruction bonds.
--St Helena, Calif., $6.4 million water refunding revenue bonds under direct purchase program.
--Warren Building Authority, Mich., $10.9 million of revenue bonds.
--Blaine, Minn., $2.04 million and $450,000 of GO tax increment bonds.
--Clarksdale Muni School District, Miss., $7.83 million GOs.
--Middletown City School District, N.Y., $34.884 million school bonds.
--Suffolk County, N.Y., $54 million and $18 million of public improvement bonds.
--Bilma Public Utility District, Texas, $1.5 million unlimited tax bonds.
